message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the thermal decomposition of sodium bicarbonate (baking soda)?
message_2:
The thermal decomposition of sodium bicarbonate (baking soda) can be represented by the following balanced chemical equation:

2 NaHCO₃ (s) → Na₂CO₃ (s) + H₂O (g) + CO₂ (g)

When sodium bicarbonate is heated, it decomposes into sodium carbonate, water vapor, and carbon dioxide gas.
